As an AI language model, sure, I can provide suggestions and tips to help you build a strong Hearthstone deck. Here are a few:

1. Understand your Hero: Each Hero in Hearthstone has its unique strengths and weaknesses, so before building your deck, understand the play-style of the Hero you choose and focus on building a deck that plays to their strengths. 2. Balance between spells and minions: Having a healthy balance of spells and minions in the deck is essential to create synergy between cards. Also, do not forget to include a few defensive tools that allow you to survive against aggressive decks. 3. Include some tech cards: Tech cards are specific cards that can counter popular decks by removing their key cards or buffing your minions while destroying enemy minions, so including such cards can drastically improve your win rate against specific match-ups. 4. Include some card draw mechanisms: Drawing the right cards is crucial to winning games, so including methods to draw cards is essential to secure victory in the late game. 5. Crafting and Dusting: As you progress, you'll earn new cards, but you can also get rid of unneeded cards by dusting them. Dust can be used to purchase new cards, so be careful about what you dust. Remember, building a strong deck takes time and experimentation, but the more you play and learn, the more effective you'll become at building strong decks.
